game.name: Heroes and Forsaken: The Wheel of Time Digital Card Game
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: The official The Wheel of Time® digital card game. Build decks, master strategy, and battle players worldwide in cross-platform, turn-based matches. Choose your faction, command iconic heroes, and shape the fate of Randland.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The official The Wheel of Time® digital card game. Build decks, master strategy, and battle players worldwide in cross-platform, turn-based matches. Choose your faction, command iconic heroes, and shape the fate of Randland.
